definitions: in a way that relates to the purpose or use of something

examples.text: the parish clergy was socially and functionally differentiated
disk and tape are functionally equivalent as storage devices

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to purpose or use of something

definitions: in a way that relates to how something works or operates

examples.text: task forces evaluated all aspects of the department both structurally and functionally

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to how something works or operates

definitions: in a way that is practical and useful, rather than attractive
shortDefinitions: in way that is practical and useful, rather than attractive
